name: Space Shooter (itch) (JnsGames)
description: Hello! This is Jnsgames, AKA, The Creator. Some of you might be wondering why there is a file that has a .sb3, well the reason to that is if you want to look behind the scenes on the code, you can go to Scratch (AKA the program I am using) and put in the file that has .sb3 at the end. Then you got the file for the game! (also if you curious how I made this file HTML, I used this webpage: HTMLifier (sheeptester.github.io)
